modmenu.summaryTranslation.gamehelper: Change your gamerules in world, F3 features and get where you dead in a GUI.
gamehelper.screen.debugger_description: Show more information in vanilla game. Maybe helpful?
gamehelper.screen.debugger.key_descripti: Press hotkey below to toggle or active features.
This don't need permission, but some server might not support.
gamehelper.screen.debugger.key.F3C: Copy player location and level as a teleport command.
gamehelper.screen.gamerules_description: You may need to enable Command to do this!
gamehelper.screen.gamerules_resync_butto: You are now in singleplayer. Resync is needless.
You are now in multiplayer. Click to manually resync.
gamehelper.screen.gamerules_tab.disabled: Disabled gamerule, which might be a experiment gamerule.
gamehelper.screen.info_display.1: You have spent %1$s in this special world!
gamehelper.screen.info_display.2: You have experienced %1$s deaths in this dangerous world!
gamehelper.screen.info_display.3: You have passed %1$s on bed in this sweet world!
gamehelper.screen.death_position_clear_b: If you or your server configure disabling death position record, then nothing will be shown here.
All death positions will be deleted in local and server.
gamehelper.screen.death_position_sync_bu: Request server to sync all death positions. This will automatically done when join a world.
Reopen Helper GUI to check sync results.
gamehelper.screen.death_position.name: [%1$s] Death at (%2$s, %3$s, %4$s)
gamehelper.screen.death_position.tp.desc: Teleport to this position. Need permission.
gamehelper.screen.death_position.hide.de: Hide this death position. It will be back when sync again.
gamehelper.message.cloth_config_not_load: [GameHelper] Cloth Config NOT loaded. You can not open config screen. Please install it and restart.
gamehelper.message.death_position_text:
[GameHelper] Your death position is:
%1$s(x=%2$s, y=%3$s, z=%4$s).
gamehelper.message.gamerules_handler.ini: [GameHelper] You can view and change gamerules in Helper GUI if you have permission.
[GameHelper] Gamerules will be automatically synced in most cases.
[GameHelper] You can view and change gamerules in Helper GUI if you enable Command.
gamehelper.message.gamerules_handler.err: [GameHelper] Your server may not install GameHelper mod. Many helper features will be disabled.
gamehelper.screen.config.title: GameHelper Config
gamehelper.screen.config.category.single: These configs only work in singleplayer (client) for you own.
gamehelper.screen.config.entry.showGamer:
If false, gamerule name in GUI and translation in tooltip.
Else, gamerule name in tooltip and translation in GUI.
gamehelper.screen.config.category.multip: These configs work for any player when you host a server, including you in singleplayer.
gamehelper.screen.config.entry.recordDea: Record death positions. Anybody can view them in their Helper GUI.
gamehelper.screen.config.entry.enableGam:
GameRulesManager runs on server, responding player's request for gamerules.
So anybody can view them in their Helper GUI.
Not affect your singleplayer.
gamehelper.screen.config.entry.disableGa: If true, server will only response gamerules requests only from player with permission, like OPs.
